caption:
This photograph displays an industrial scene with complex structures on the right side of the image set against a natural landscape in the foreground. The most striking part of the industrial setup consists of several large buildings in different shades of gray and beige, along with a prominent vertical tank and multiple converging conveyors and ducts. Some of these buildings have smokestacks, from which faint plumes of white smoke or steam are visible, suggesting active operation.

The natural foreground features a calm body of water that reflects some elements of the industrial structures, providing contrast between the industrial and natural environments. Surrounding the water is a lush green area, likely marshy, with dense foliage.

Overall, the composition juxtaposes the man-made industrial complex against the serene, natural setting, highlighting the interaction between industrial development and the natural environment. The light appears dim, possibly indicating early morning or late evening, adding a moody tone to the scene.
title: Entrance to the Kaiser Aluminum plant. Because of the corrosive fumes from this and other plants in the area, the bridge (which spans the Mississippi River) must be constantly sand blasted and repainted.
